fields.description:
create single user view and new user creation. Much in common.

https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+User+View
https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Create+new+user

comments.body:
I'm going to make 2 different views, one for new user, one for managing an existing user. The quota section will be factored out into a common template.
They might share the same view... we'll see how that plays out.

FYI, on the GetUserInfo command, the key/value pairs may contain a key "email". We could use the same, but I realize this is probably not a 4.0 thing. Just wanted to finish looking this up.

2014-01-24 13:56:47,836 DEBUG   GetUserInfo -- response content --
<GetUserInfoResponse xmlns="https://iam.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-08/"><GetUserInfoResult><Infos><member><Key>email</Key><Value>dak@eucalyptus.com</Value></member></Infos></GetUserInfoResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>3eeee5c2-a368-48e4-9a38-5d8efd8e4d73</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></GetUserInfoResponse>
2014-01-24 13:56:47,837 DEBUG   GetUserInfo -- end of response content --
email	dak@eucalyptus.com

I have user-add working fairly well, but some checkbox actions are still incomplete due to e-mail questions. I also need to tweak the user editor so that the "user" isn't forced to click "add user" (essentially match wireframe features)
Now, can change user password, requiring the current account admin's password.

pushed code for access key features. Just got access key download working (not pushed).
Going to generate password csv file next.

- list policies in group tiles
- move name into title of tile

- prompt for policy delete
- show text area modal for policy edit

an update:
Loads all policies and extracts lowest quota value across all.
coded policy saving cases of;
- changing existing value
- removing value
- adding quota value

saves value to policy it came from
saves new quotas to existing euca-console-default policy or creates that policy

debugging all those aspects right now.

Looking good! A few comments:

* Needs title, please. See https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+User+View
* I am still seeing a help icon in the upper right corner, that shouldn't be there. Screenshot attached so you can see it. (hoping we can address this more generally)
* options under General and Password are right justified in the container and should not be. They should be left justified according to the longest label like the wireframe, please. (tweaked that stuff left)
* no generate random password option available? (done)
* password field labels don't match wireframe, and should be stacked on top of fields rather than to the left (done)
* there is a weird horizontal line between the two password fields. Screenshot attached. (password strength meter...)
* when user is not in groups there is a weird message being displayed. There doesn't need to be any message displayed in that case, please. Screenshot attached (fixed on groups and keys)
* edit policy tooltip should say "View/Edit policy" instead, please. (fixed)
* in Quotas text, the word resources should be plural. (fixed)
[~kgill], thoughts on what to do about the help icon issue?
[~jloza]  Should be a simple fix to only display the help icon on landing pages.  Will work on it today.
